|Identifier | `urn:shapes:targeted-survey-general-field-protocol-shapes:weather-site-temperature:used-procedure`

|Comment | IRI of procedure _MUST_ have the value `<https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/33544e85-741a-4646-ba32-c820486f0a33>`.
